articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary as England face Colombia in the Women's World Cup quarter-finals.

articles.description: England book a Women's World Cup semi-final with co-hosts Australia after taking their chances against Colombia.

articles.description: Follow reaction as Harry Kane joins Bayern Munich from Tottenham, plus build-up to Saturday's Premier League action.

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane joins German champions Bayern Munich on a four-year deal, ending his record-breaking career at Tottenham.
articles.title: Bayern sign England captain Kane from Tottenham

articles.description: Co-hosts Australia reach the Women's World Cup semi-finals for the first time as they beat France in a penalty shoot-out at Brisbane Stadium
articles.title: Australia beat France on penalties to reach last four

articles.description: Alessia Russo fires England into the lead in the second half of their Women's World Cup quarter-final against Colombia in Sydney.
articles.title: Russo fires England into lead against Colombia
